<img src="http://errantweb.com/image/logo.png">

**ErrantWeb 512MB KVM Chicago Sale Edition!**

---

**Ram:** 512MB
**Raid Protected HDD Storage:** 20GB
**Bandwidth:** 2000GB ( Get it raised to 3000GB for free just open a ticket! )
**CPU Cores (Xeon E3-1230 3.2GHz):** 2 
**OS:** Free linux distro's or you can provide your own ISO & Key for Linux or Windows!
**Setup Time:** Within 24 hours for first order, instant for current clients.
**How many per client?** You can order as many as you wish, we have low stock on this offer though.
**IPv6:** 10 ( for more open ticket )
**IPv4:** 1

**Order Now:**
https://www.errantweb.com/client/cart.php?a=add&pid=86

**$5.00** _/m_ or **$15.00** _/quarterly_

---


ErrantWeb has been providing amazing web hosting solutions in Detroit for months now! We have recently expanded to Chicago and this will be our first offer posted on LowEndTalk for this plan! It includes a great amount of HDD space and Bandwidth! A test IP and emails to contact us will be located below.




**Contact us for custom quote or questions:** sales@errantweb.com
**Test IP:** chi.errantweb.com

More offers may be posted in this thread! So make sure to check back if this offer does not suit you.
